0.3.description: Copies an AMI from any region into the current region. This action can also encrypt the new AMI.

SourceRegion.description: The region where the source AMI currently exists.

SourceImageId.description: The AMI ID to copy from the source region.

ImageName.description: The name for the new image.

ImageDescription.description: A description for the target image.

KmsKeyId.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Key Management Service CMK to use when encrypting the snapshots of an image during a copy operation.

ClientToken.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure request idempotency.

ImageId.description: The ID of the copied image.

ImageState.description: The state of the copied image.
